title: Everything Wrong With Mulan (2020) In 19 Minutes Or Less
author: CinemaSins
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp. Join today and get 10% off your first month: http://betterhelp.com/cinemasins

Disney continues their quest to live-action every single animated movie they've ever made, with this dull and boring Mulan movie. The magic is missing here, folks, and it's not just because there's no Mushu. And we count the sins to prove why. 

Thursday: Sins of a mid-aughts comedy that got a surprising sequel.

No movie is without sin. Which movie's sins should we count next?
